column4: ok, i'm having this problem with lynx, and also opera, i'm starting a download, directly from hak5.org (their podcast), and it gets like halfway, and then stops... can anyone help me with that. It works fine with firefox.
Use "copy link location" or something, then paste it into "wget -c URL"
The "-c" is for "continue" (I always use it, since when the connection dies I often just press up to get the same command back, but without -c it just starts again)
